titleInfo.title: The history of photography : from 1839 to the present day

name.namePart: Museum of Modern Art (New York, N.Y.)

originInfo.publisher: Museum of Modern Art : Distributed by the New York Graphic Society

mods.note: Text originally published in the exhibition catalog Photography, 1839-1937 by the Museum of Modern Art in 1937. In 1938 the text and ill. were reprinted with minor revisions as Photography: a short critical history./ Includes bibliographical references (p. [205]-211) and index./
